name.str_pl: issues of Gun Digest

variants.description: Annual magazine about firearms, weapon collections, self-defense, same as some practical and legal advices.

name.str_pl: issues of Recoil

variants.description: A modern magazine about handguns, tactical weapons, knives, and shooting activities.  It says there is a fold-out target, but someone took it off.

name.str_pl: issues of SWAT

variants.description: "Special Weapons And Tactics for the prepared American", this magazine contains info about firearms, law enforcement, and related interests, with a focus on SWAT police officers.

name.str_pl: issues of Bullet Point

variants.description: Small magazine about ammo and firearms, and how to choose, use, and maintain them properly.

name.str_pl: issues of Trigger Happy

variants.description: Modern magazine for young people about firearms, self-defense, different competitions, and reviews.

name.str_pl: copies of The Gun Owner's Handbook

description: A thick soft-cover book that claims to be a complete guide to safely operating, maintaining, and repairing firearms.

name.str_pl: copies of The Gun Owner's Handbook

variants.description: A thick soft-cover book that claims to be a complete guide to safely operating, maintaining, and repairing firearms.

name.str_pl: copies of FM 3-90-1: Offense And Defense

variants.description: Official U.S. Army manual about basics and tactics of moving and attacking a target - how to shoot, how to hide, how to retreat, and how to defend.

name.str_pl: issues of Surplus Military

variants.description: A journal about modern and old firearms, their style, manufacturing, and usage.

name.str_pl: copies of Owning a Modern Firearm

variants.description: Essential handbook detailing how to own, use, and properly maintain a modern-day firearm.

name.str_pl: copies of Practical Shooting Training

variants.description: Step-by-step instructions on how to use a gun, with lot of drills for each level.

name.str_pl: copies of The Illustrated History of Firearms

variants.description: A reference book that contains hundreds of images of firearms inside, with lot of comments from professionals and information about each model.

name.str_pl: copies of Long Range Shooting Handbook

variants.description: "The Complete Beginner's Guide to Precision Rifle Shooting", this book contains information about shooting equipment, terminology, principles, and covers the theory of long-range shooting.  It has a lot practical advices about marksmanship.

name.str_pl: copies of The Rifle-Musket

variants.description: "A Practical Treatise on the Enfield-Pritchett Rifle, Recently Adopted in the British Service".  This is a practical guide to using the newly adopted P-1853 Enfield Rifle-Musket.  Despite being written in 1854, it still has lot of useful information about shooting, as well as information about how to maintain this antique rifle.

name.str_pl: copies of Pocket Guide to Firearm Safety

description: This pocket-sized leather-bound guide to firearm safety combines a wealth of concise information with simple to follow instructions and easy to read illustrations.

name.str_pl: copies of Ballistics: Theory, Design, and Application

description: This hefty, hardbound textbook is written in obtuse, complex language.  If you already knew a bit about engineering and fabrication, it might be a useful reference on gunsmithing and design, but without that knowledge it'd be better used to prop up a table.

name.str_pl: copies of Ballistics: Theory, Design, and Application

variants.description: This hefty, hardbound textbook is written in obtuse, complex language.  If you already knew a bit about engineering and fabrication, it might be a useful reference on gunsmithing and design, but without that knowledge it'd be better used to prop up a table.

name.str_pl: copies of The Complete Guide to Gunsmithing

variants.description: This fairly old book is a highly detailed and essential reference for any gun enthusiast, and covers everything from the use of proper tools to how to get a gunsmithing job.

name.str_pl: copies of Professional Gunsmithing

variants.description: A guide for gun shop owners, this book contains lots of information about weapons and weapon maintenance.

name.str_pl: copies of Gunsmithing - Rifles

variants.description: The book contains step-by-step instructions to repair and maintain all major rifle types, from the AR-15 and AK-47 to the M1 Garand.  It also details many different projects and enhancements for gun owners.

name.str: Gunsmithing: A Manual of Firearm Design, Construction, Alteration and Remodeling
name.str_pl: copies of Gunsmithing: A Manual of Firearm Design, Construction, Alteration and Remodeling

variants.description: This book contains extremely precise instructions for fixing different issues with your gun.  Having lots of modern photos is a huge advantage, though the fact that it's a reprint of a book from the 1950s is not.

name.str: The Guns of John Moses Browning
name.str_pl: copies of The Guns of John Moses Browning

variants.description: A major biography of John Moses Browning, "the Thomas Edison of guns", this book describes his story, and the inventions he made, as well as decisions behind their development, processes, manufacturing, and usage.

name.str: DIY Guns: Easy DIY Gunsmithing Projects
name.str_pl: issues of DIY Guns: Easy DIY Gunsmithing Projects

variants.description: A big magazine about different gunsmithing projects, from tuning your gun to making a brand new one using common techniques.

name.str_pl: copies of The Book of the Crossbow

variants.description: This book details the long story of crossbows - a devastating weapon which improved medieval distance warfare drastically - with lot of illustrations and information about additional weapons, like ballistae and catapults.
